name: tocterm
summary: Utitliy to add cterm support to color schemes without the GUIColorSchemes plugin
description:
Script to add cterm support to color schemes without the need for the GUIColorSchemes plugin

Git Repo: http://shawnbiddle.com/toCterm

Note: The utlity will only convert HTML colors. Named colors (Grey, Green, etc.) will not be translated to cterm.
Note #2: Depending on the speed of your machine and the size of your colorscheme the script may take a while.
install_details:
Requirements:
PHP >= 5

Install:
1. tar -zxvf tocterm.tar.gz
2. Place 'xterm' in your path

Usage:
1. Open the color scheme to convert in Vim
2. :so <path to Vim-toCterm>/tocterm.vim
3. ???
4. Profit
